old: "日記の１ページが落ちている"
new: "A page out of a diary has fallen down."

old:
最後の戦いは、壮絶を極めました
侵食の悪魔――
相手はまさに、その言葉にふさわしい怪物でした
new: The final battle was truly epic. The demon of infection—our adversary was undoubtedly a monster befitting those words.

old:
最後の力を振り絞り、何とか止めを刺したものの――
我々従者は深手を負ってしまったのです
new: We mustered our last ounce of strength and managed to strike the finishing blow, but as a result, we, the servants, sustained serious injuries.

old:
傷つき、動けない我々を残し
ベンジャミン様は一人、行ってしまわれました
目的を達するためには足手まといは不要――
そういうことなのでしょう
new: Leaving us wounded and immobilized behind, Master Benjamin went on alone. To achieve the objective, we can't have anything slowing us down—perhaps that was the reason.

old:
導きを失った私たちは
ただ愚直に、主の帰りを待つことしかできません
最後の魔窟殿へ独りで向かった、傷だらけの主を――
new: We, who have lost our guidance, can do nothing but earnestly await the return of our master. Our master, who ventured alone to the final demon's lair, battered and bruised.

old:
戻られたあの方を暖かく迎えるため
一体何をすべきか、ベンジャミン様と交わした言葉を
思い起こしながら考えてみようと思います
new: I will think about what we should do to warmly welcome them back based on the words exchanged with Master Benjamin, with the aim of greeting them upon their return.
